bio.address: 10/16 Hanoar Haoved Street, Ashkelon, zip code 78751
bio.brief: in Ethiopia I was a teacher and an education inspector. Along with my government job I was a social leader and activist, in all life aspects. I worked with all different levels of society in 'Shire' at Tigray regional government. I hosted private people and groups, as well as social and international functions. In Israel i taught for the first two years, I counseled and guided droups about different topics such as relocation, education, health, culture, laws and rules of behavior. I still take part in social activities as long as it doesn't interfere with my work as social care department.
bio.languages: Tigrinya, Amharic, English, Hebrew, Russian (reading and writing)

education.desc: Teacher training course in 'Horaa' in Desse, Ethiopia
Political (State) sceince academic course in Sophia, Bulgaria
B.A in social work, M.A in organizational counseling and development.

certifications.desc: Young leadership for new residents in Jerusalem and Tel-Aviv
Guides for parents, family and community training
Policy, child's rights and parental responsibility - Child Saftey council and Herzog center
Guides training for community strength - Mashabim and the Jewish Agency
